attributes.action: Please put a stop to the increasing cost of petrol as this is causing families/individuals/businesses a great deal of stress
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rising cost of petrol has reached a peak and is set to go up further, with the ever increasing costs in other areas of our lives this added increase means that we are having to make cuts at a time when it seems impossible to make any further cuts. A large percentage of our petrol bills are taxed, surely this is enough for the Government?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
